website_summaries.verdict: Coordinated set with 19-inch carry-on, 12-inch duffel, 19-inch backpack, and 18-inch cinch sack. Covers all luggage options that are necessary for family vacations.
pros: Vibrant black, white, and red colors with Mickey print
Rolling carry-on features plenty of pockets to keep contents organized
Cinch sack is a quality bag ideal for daily excursions
cons: Some issues with the telescopic handle when trying to collapse it
Print is a bit too “in-your-face” for some people

customer_reviews.title: Adorable 4 piece Mickey luggage set!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this Mickey Mouse luggage set! Such a great price for 4 pieces and the details and color is adorable. My 8 yr old son is so excited to pack his things in his new suitcase for our trip to WDW. However, I am knocking off one star from this rating because the rope straps on the drawstring bag were somewhat torn and frayed and on top of that they are way too thick and oversized for the bag. But everything else was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps not what I wa looking for
customer_reviews.text: While the price was great on this package group, I struggled to really find a way to use all the items included. The backpack was almost the same size as the suitcase! and the other smaller items seemed to lack purpose for our family's needs. I was looking for a most stable, stronger designed suitcase for the grandson, something he could grow with for 5-7 years, this just seemed too young and not in that field. The quality was good, but the design was the part that did not fit with what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but smaller than expected and we didn't receive the sling bag so I'm sending it back and ordering the 21 inch of our other Disney luggages. I'm giving 3 stars because it's still cute and maybe perfect for someone that doesn't need as much room as we do. Also dropping a star because it was missing a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Q.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandsons birthday. He liked it and has used all the pieces already. Nice set
customer_reviews.author: WUW

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly in Love 😍
customer_reviews.text: I not really until posting comments on products ! But I’m In love with this Disney Set ... I bought it so Me & my kids can have matching luggage (Xmas Gift) .Awesome choice as we speaking I’m buying another set .... ps I stealing one of the back packs lol 😇😈😇
customer_reviews.author: Cmercy980

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Set For A Boy✈️
customer_reviews.text: I order it for my 7 year old son for a vacation trip to Hawaii. He love it. Also back-bag can slide on the handle of the suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jen🙌🏾🖤🔥

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little luggage set. Seems to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jsquared

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Nice quality and much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Very accessible for travelers
customer_reviews.text: My grandson went to Disneyland, perfect luggage for the occasion, would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: kelly shea-lawrence

customer_reviews.title: All of the luggage you need in ONE set!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for long weekend vacations and it has been great! It would be even better for long trips - especially to Disney World! The suitcase has wheels which makes it easy for my 7 year old to be in charge of it (she loves rolling it around!). There is also a backpack, duffle bag, and a sling bag. The sling bag would be great to keep bathing suits when going to the beach/pool. The backpack can carry snacks and go-to items when out and about on your trip. The great thing about this set is the backpack, duffle bag, and sling bag all fit nicely into the rolling suitcase for easier storage in-between trips.
customer_reviews.author: Romero

customer_reviews.title: Useful for all types of travels
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute set and nice quality too. It has pretty much any size bag a youngster would need for travels of any kind. The rolling luggage is kid sized, but actually very roomy and has pockets for smaller items and accessories. The duffle, gym sack, and backpack are all nice and very useful. The Mickey motif is cute because it isnt a totally juvenile Mickey print. An adult could easily use the print as a Mickey fan. This set will get a lot of use here for vacations, day trips and overnight stays with relatives. Happy with it and with the variety of sizes of bags.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenName

customer_reviews.title: Excellent luggage for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed wit the American Tourister Kids 4 piece luggage set. Made of very durable thick polyester fabric with double seams that is made to last. All the zippers, pockets and pouches work great. No loose seams or threads and it is very well made. This set of luggage may seem to be for kids but adults can use them too. Really cute Mickey Mouse head on the fabric and I especially like this because it can be for a little kid or for an older kid. A nice unisex luggage that has more room than you think. Really a very nice set of luggage for kids. Very pleased with the set and so are my grandsons!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stroh

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable luggage set. It is perfect for our 3 and 5 year olds. It comes shipped compact with the bags inside the main bag. The carry-on is a great size, plenty of room and keeps everything they need for their trip. The retractable handle is smooth, as are the rollers. The little backpack fits perfectly and the other small bags work perfectly for on the go activities. In love with the subtle Mickey Mouse design, the girls are head of heels for this set. Would highly recommend to anyone. Would make such a cute gift!
customer_reviews.author: Rk Star

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient space and good zippers
customer_reviews.text: I love everything Disney, I always have, so this design is perfect. It won’t hold up to super rough treatment, but it is durable and I like the texture of the polyester. Easy to wipe free of dust with a damp cloth. The spinner wheels move freely and are tough. The zippers worked smoothly and secure well. They have sufficient space and good tie downs to keep clothes from getting jostled about. The handles are a good design that are comfortable to grip and pull.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: Great design for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: American Tourister is known for high quality luggage, and this set is no exception. Each piece is well crafted and high functional. The backpack is the only exception, as there really isn't much to it- no water bottle holster, no front pouches. It's a simple backpack, which may be okay for most kids. The design great- clearly Mickey but without being ridiculously flashy and colorful. These work well for adults too!
customer_reviews.author: Roger N. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is branded Mickey Mouse luggage made by Samsonite. It comes in a 4 piece set for kids. It's a soft shell with two rolling wheels to pull with. It comes with the luggage, a backpack, a duffle, and a cinch bag. They all match with graphic Mickey Wars. The luggage is great quality and the zippers appear to be strong. Looking forward to trying it out!
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: This set is really a cute set for the kids. Soon as my kids saw it they were excited. It is actually a kid sized set which is great and not great. Airlines still charge per piece of luggage so this might not be my go to set for a long trip. For car trips and short trips this is great however.
customer_reviews.author: MATT A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy and quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, quality, sturdy and complete matching luggage set - kids love them, super happy and excited to travel with them, easy to use. Great for both boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids looking to get away from "kiddy" prints.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality with an easy to spot print. Not so childish that my daughter won't want to use later. Mickey is visible, but admittedly not as noticeable as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Helsing

customer_reviews.title: Great set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: Great set of luggage, perfect for young kids who are big Disney fans. Quality is top notch for the price, cool design, and built to last. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bevers

product_meta.title: American Tourister Disney Softside Luggage, Mickey 4 Piece Set
product_meta.description: Color:Mickey 4 Piece SetFour great items for any length trip! Printed polyester with Mickey ear silhouette, Ret trim accents, Rubberized American Tourister logo.
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES: 19” Carry-On: 19" x 12.25" x 9" & 4.7 lbs, Backpack: 19" x 11.5" x 6" & 1.7 lbs., Duffel: 12" x 18.5" x 9" & 1.2 lbs., Cinch Sak: 18" x 14.5" x 1.5" & 0.75 lbs

10 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: American Tourister products are rigorously tested to ensure our products meet stringent standards. This set comes with a 10-year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship

RETRACTABLE HANDLE Provides easy maneuverability when extended out from the suitcase, and stores neatly inside when not in use. Locks in place in both the fully extended and stored positions for secure traveling
FUN DISNEY Printed polyester with Mickey ear silhouette

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
